vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A womanof the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.4.5; married to Ashhur (H0806);
mother of: Zereth (H6889), Izhar (H3328), Ethnan (H0869) and Koz (H6976)
§ Helah = "rust"
one of the two wives of Ashur, father of Tekoah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (2)   esposa de Ashur, fundador de Tecoa
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希拉 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "鏽"
提哥亞的父親亞施戶的兩個妻子之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希拉 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "锈"
提哥亚的父亲亚施户的两个妻子之一
